oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1960-12-17 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from December 17, 1960. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Faron Young (host/performer), guest performer Kitty Wells with Bill Phillips, and regular performers Archie Campbell, the Jordanaires, Tommy Jackson, Chet Atkins, Minnie Pearl, and Grandpa Jones and Ramona Jones. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 1106th broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Faron Young; Archie Campbell; Kitty Wells; Bill Phillips; Jordanaires; Tommy Jackson; Chet Atkins
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Grant Turner introduces Faron Young -- Forget The Past (Faron Young) -- Opening statement (Grant Turner, Faron Young) -- Faron Young introduces Archie Campbell -- Comedy routine (Archie Campbell, Faron Young) -- Faron Young introduces Kitty Wells -- I Can't Tell My Heart That (Kitty Wells, Bill Phillips, Jordanaires) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, Faron Young) -- Faron Young introduces Tommy Jackson -- [Unidentified fiddle tune] (Tommy Jackson fiddle) -- Grant Turner introduces Faron Young -- When I've Learned Enough To Live (Faron Young) -- Faron Young introduces Chet Atkins -- The Wedding Samba (Chet Atkins)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; United States.
